# 46 node-3
## CPU
S5000C
## memory
512G
## /sys/kernel/debug/memblock/memory

```
   0: 0x0000000080000000..0x00000000b8ffffff    <==911M
   1: 0x00000000b9000000..0x00000000b900ffff
   2: 0x00000000b9010000..0x00000000e98cffff
   3: 0x00000000e98d0000..0x00000000ebdeffff
   4: 0x00000000ebdf0000..0x00000000faffffff
   5: 0x00000000fb000000..0x00000000fbffffff
   6: 0x00000000fc400000..0x00000000fc4fffff
   7: 0x0000010000000000..0x0000010f7fffffff
   8: 0x0000100080000000..0x00001000ffffffff
   9: 0x0000110000000000..0x0000110f7fffffff
  10: 0x0000200080000000..0x00002000ffffffff
  11: 0x0000210000000000..0x0000210f7fffffff
  12: 0x0000300080000000..0x00003000ffffffff
  13: 0x0000310000000000..0x0000310f7fffffff
  14: 0x0000400080000000..0x00004000ffffffff
  15: 0x0000410000000000..0x0000410f7fffffff
  16: 0x0000500080000000..0x00005000ffffffff
  17: 0x0000510000000000..0x0000510f7fffffff
  18: 0x0000600080000000..0x00006000ffffffff
  19: 0x0000610000000000..0x0000610f7fffffff
  20: 0x0000700080000000..0x00007000ffffffff
  21: 0x0000710000000000..0x0000710f7fffffff
```

但是kernel img 会加载到 `0x80080000`, 通过
`/proc/iomem`, `/sys/kernel/debug/memblock/reserved`
都可以看到reserved的内存大小, 以`/sys/kernel/debug/memblock/reserved`
为例:
```
`/sys/kernel/debug/memblock/reserved`:

0: 0x0000000080080000..0x00000000833dffff
```

所以上面 `memory.0 [0x0000000080000000..0x00000000b8ffffff]`,
应为`0x833dffff, 0xb8ffffff` 为860M

> NOTE
>
> `/proc/iomem` 和 `/sys/kernel/debug/memblock/reserved`
> 不一致
>
> /proc/iomem:
>
> ```
> 80000000-b8ffffff : System RAM
>   80080000-8157ffff : Kernel code
>   81580000-81b2ffff : reserved
>   81b30000-8342ffff : Kernel data
> ```
>
> 个人感觉应该以 `/sys/kernel/debug/memblock/reserved` 为准
